title: How to watch The Bachelor 2021 online: stream season 25 from anywhere
author: aatif-sulleyman
summary: Where will Matt James's Final Rose go?
article: The 25th season of The Bachelor is set to come to an end in typically dramatic style with hunky 28-year-old real estate broker, entrepreneur and community organization founder Matt James ready to make his final choice. Settle in as we detail how to watch The Bachelor online in 2021 and stream every season 25 episode of the hit reality show, wherever you are in the world right now - including the finale and After the Final Rose special.

Matt was originally set to be one of the suitors on the latest season of The Bachelorette - but now finds himself the man in charge of the roses. So, instead of battling a bunch of other guys for the affections of one lucky lady, he's got loads of eligible bachelorettes trying to catch his eye.
After two months of dramatic dating and the usual array of emotional ups and downs, it all comes down to Matt's choice between Rachael Kirkconnell or Michelle Young.

Additionally, Matt is acutely aware that he's the first Black male lead in The Bachelor's history. The philanthropist has said it's hugely important for him that the contestants try to understand his experiences and embrace who he is: "That's part of who I am, and it's going to be part of our relationship."
Ready to see more sparks fly and overpriced flowers wilt? Keep reading as we detail how to watch The Bachelor 2021 online and stream every new episode live from anywhere today.
Taking a well-earned vacation or out of the country on business? Not a problem. You can easily keep up with new episodes of The Bachelor from almost anywhere, despite geo-blocking restrictions.

The solution is simple. Just download a VPN, to alter your IP address to your home country, which will then let you watch your favorite shows – like The Bachelor – no matter where you are. Once installed, select the location of your home country and simply click connect. Viola! You’ll then be privy to all the backbiting and interpersonal drama that the new series has to offer.

And don't forget that a VPN isn't just for reality TV - there's loads you can do with these clever bits of software. From unblocking restricted sites and watching Netflix in other countries, to adding an extra layer of security for online shopping and banking, Virtual Private Networks offer loads of benefits beyond streaming TV.

Matt has already been a massive hit with Bachelor Nation, having been recast for The Bachelor after originally been in the running for one of the 32 contestants in season 16 of The Bachelorette. He looks the complete package, combining good looks with a golden heart.

A real-estate broker by trade, the 28-year-old heartthrob from North Carolina has also founded a charity that aims to encourage physical and mental wellbeing in kids from under-served communities in New York City.

He also tried out for the NFL franchises Carolina Panthers and New Orleans Saints as a wide receiver, and is best friends with fan fave Tyler Cameron, who finished runner-up in season 15 of The Bachelorette.
